title: The Bright Yellow Hat feat. Jona Xiao
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Jona Xiao (Raya and the Last Dragon, Hightown) plays a flower peddler who makes gardens and goodness grow in this story with Chinese, Tibetan, Japanese, Moroccan, French, Canadian, and Peruvian roots.
